#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<iomanip>
using namespace std;

long double a[1005][1005];
int main()
{ int i,j,t,k,n;
long double d;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    { 
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
           {
            for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
            a[i][j]=0;
           }

    while(1)
    {
       cin>>i>>j>>d;
        if(i==-1){break;}
        a[i][j]=d;
        a[j][i]=d;

    }
    for(k=1;k<=n;k++)
    {
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
                a[i][j]=max(a[i][j],min(a[i][k],a[k][j]));
        }
    }
 cout<<setprecision(10)<<a[1][n]<<endl;
    }
return 0;
}
